attributes.long-description:
VERTIGO™ is a white knuckle race over wild landscapes collecting upgrades, discovering hidden shortcuts while negotiating some of the most challenging courses in the Universe.

Race across tracks suspended high above sprawling cities and lush vistas, but don’t miss a turn... it’s a long way down!

KEY FEATURES

•Amazing sense of height and scale as you race hundreds of metres above ground through 54 Vertigo Inducing Race Courses
•Varied Single Player Game Modes – including Practice, Arcade, Time Trial and Career
•Multiplayer Time-Trial - up to 4 players can race to beat each other’s Best Times
•Customise your Xorb Craft – customise the look of your Xorb with over 2 million unique combinations

attributes.name: Vertigo™
